workshoptitle: AI Services: Introduction to OCI Language

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Learn how to discovers insights in unstructured text using natural language processing

tutorials.title: Get started
tutorials.description: Sign up for and log into the Oracle Cloud

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Analyze text with pre-trained models
tutorials.description: Learn how to use pre-trained models to analyze text

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create and train custom models
tutorials.description: Learn how to create a custom model using the oci console

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Translate text through OCI Console and python SDK
tutorials.description: Learn how to use language translate to translate text

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create async jobs and document translation
tutorials.description: Learn how to create async jobs and document translation using the oci console

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create and analyze text with healthcare and multilingual models
tutorials.description: Learn how to create a healthcare and multilingual to analyze text using the oci console

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
